import React, { useState, useCallback, FC } from 'react' import styles from './popupTweet.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../../images/png/Bitmap.png' import globe from '../../images/svg/popup/globe-alt.svg' import iconOne from '../../images/svg/popup/image.svg' import music from '../../images/svg/popup/music-speaker.svg' import align from '../../images/svg/popup/align-left.svg' import calendar from '../../images/svg/popup/calendar-two.svg' import coffee from '../../images/svg/popup/coffee.svg' type props = { SetPostNews: any, setPopup: any, flagLike: any, setFlagLike: any } const PopupTweet: FC = React.memo(({ SetPostNews, setPopup, flagLike, setFlagLike }) => { const [value, setValue] = useState('') const onClick = () => setPopup((prev: any) => !prev) const ChangeEvent = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setValue(e.target.value) }, []) const Click = useCallback( (e: React.MouseEvent) => { if (value.length > 0) { setFlagLike((prev: any) => !prev) SetPostNews((prev: any) => [...prev, { value, flagLike }]) setValue('') onClick() } else { onClick() } }, [SetPostNews, value, onClick] ) return (

Отвечать могут все пользователи

) }) export default PopupTweet
